context.id: Mandi, berwudu, memakai pakaian ihram di miqat.
context.en: Take a bath, perform ablution, and wear ihram clothing at the miqat.

content.arrabic: نَوَيْتُ الْحَجَّ وَأَحْرَمْتُ بِهِ لِلّٰهِ تَعَالَى

context.en: Increase the recitation of talbiyah during the journey.

content.arrabic: لَبَّيْكَ اللَّهُمَّ لَبَّيْكَ، لَبَّيْكَ لَا شَرِيْكَ لَكَ لَبَّيْكَ

context.id: Mengelilingi Ka’bah 7 kali, dimulai dari Hajar Aswad.
context.en: Circling the Kaaba 7 times, starting from the Black Stone.

context.id: Berjalan 7 kali antara Shafa dan Marwah.
context.en: Walk 7 times between Safa and Marwah.

content.arrabic: لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ

context.id: Berdiam diri di Arafah, berzikir dan berdoa.
context.en: Staying still in Arafah, remembering Allah and praying.

content.arrabic: لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ

context.en: Spending the night in Muzdalifah, collecting stones.

context.id: Melempar 7 batu ke Jumrah Aqabah di Mina.
context.en: Throwing 7 stones at Jamarat Aqabah in Mina.

context.id: Mencukur atau memotong rambut setelah Jumrah.
context.en: Shaving or cutting hair after Jumrah.

context.id: Mengelilingi Ka’bah 7 kali sebagai rukun haji.
context.en: Circumambulating the Kaaba 7 times as a pillar of Hajj.

context.id: Sa’i setelah tawaf ifadah untuk haji tamattu’.
context.en: Sa’i after tawaf ifadah for hajj tamattu’.

content.arrabic: لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ

context.id: Bermalam di Mina, lempar tiga jumrah.
context.en: Stay overnight in Mina, throw stones at the three jamarat.

context.id: Mencukur rambut lagi, semua larangan ihram dihalalkan.
context.en: Shaving the hair again, all ihram prohibitions are lifted.
